description:
PostgREST serves a fully RESTful API from any existing PostgreSQL database. It provides a cleaner, more standards-compliant, faster API than you are likely to write from scratch.

## Features

- Tables and Views
- Unicode Support
- Resource Embedding
- Custom Queries
- Stored Procedures
- Insertions / Updates
- Deletions
- OpenAPI Support
- HTTP Status Codes
- Authentication
- Schema Isolation

## Package parameters

- `/InstallDir` - Installation directory, by default `c:\postgrest`.
summary: REST API for any Postgres database
author: Joe Nelson
